channel.title: Winter Life's Development, (Updated)
channel.description:
[u][b]Winter Life Development[/b][/u]
[i]Well here's a little introduction paragraph about my development. I am currently working with FigmentScape some say it's very laggy well it's not going to be when i'm done with it. I am currently working on a server kind of based like RuneScape no it is not a cheesy re-make of DeltaScape. It will still have some base to it, it will actually have an economy. Here is a list of what the Future and Current Updates are.[/i]
[ul][li]CastleWars - 25%[/li] [li]Full Fishing - 100%[/li] [li]Full Fletching - 100%[/li] [li]AutoCasting - 100% (Will Add A Video.)[/li] [li]Full Woodcutting - 100%[/li] [li]Food timers, - 80%[/li] [li]Npc's cannot walk through solid objects. - 75%[/li] [li]Npc's that fit the category of the skill gives out skillcapes - 65%[/li] [li]Depletion of the client.java size to 600kb currently 950kb - 75%[/li] [li]Working silab skulls - 100%[/li][/ul]
[i]That about covers my development i will update the percentages as i go along. ;) Keep in mind i'm only so good at coding and my efforts can only be pushed so far, this is not going to be DeltaScape it's going to be completely Figment Based. Godwars may become more realistic, aswell as barrows taken from RichScape[/i].
[i]As i went on and thought about it my project may take a little while so i'm going to do what most people do and release things in versions i'll probably be releasing my V1 around Christmas, but there will be a slight difference some things like the (Food timers, Npcs that fit the category of the skill gives out skillcapes, Npcs that cannot walk through solid objects will be released in V2, just a little update my V1 should be out by next friday or so. I am currently working as hard as i can on my source.[/i]
[i]I have decided to make my server [u]almost[/u] identical to RuneScape, it's not going to be impossible training but, it also will not be like DeltaScape meaning it won't have the same quest features, but i just decided to turn the project around. When I say almost i mean...no shops spread around the whole map, it's going to be a normal Free To Play server, and when you get members your entitled to the members items, this could stretch the length but i will finish, and thats a promise.[/i]
[i]As I go on and I scroll down the [b]Client.Java[/b] I notice how much work the whole project needs. I was asked to make a client, which is what i'm going to do on top of this whole project, the whole meaning of the server is to make it fun while the skills are pretty slow, it gives you a challenge, it will still be like normal Figment all the shops will be the same, just the skills re-vamped and edited. I hope you all enjoy my updates. [/i]

@WinterLife wrote:

item.title: Winter Life's Development, (Updated)
item.dc:creator: @WinterLife WinterLife
item.description:
@WinterLife wrote:

                              [u][b]Winter Life Development[/b][/u]

Well here’s a little introduction paragraph about my development. I am currently working with FigmentScape some say it’s very laggy well it’s not going to be when i’m done with it. I am currently working on a server kind of based like RuneScape no it is not a cheesy re-make of DeltaScape. It will still have some base to it, it will actually have an economy. Here is a list of what the Future and Current Updates are.

[ul][li]CastleWars - 25%[/li]
[li]Full Fishing - 100%[/li]
[li]Full Fletching - 100%[/li]
[li]AutoCasting - 100% (Will Add A Video.)[/li]
[li]Full Woodcutting - 100%[/li]
[li]Food timers, - 80%[/li]
[li]Npc’s cannot walk through solid objects. - 75%[/li]
[li]Npc’s that fit the category of the skill gives out skillcapes - 65%[/li]
[li]Depletion of the client.java size to 600kb currently 950kb - 75%[/li]
[li]Working silab skulls - 100%[/li][/ul]

That about covers my development i will update the percentages as i go along.
Keep in mind i’m only so good at coding and my efforts can only be pushed so far, this is not going to be DeltaScape it’s going to be completely Figment Based. Godwars may become more realistic, aswell as barrows taken from RichScape.

As i went on and thought about it my project may take a little while so i’m going to do what most people do and release things in versions i’ll probably be releasing my V1 around Christmas, but there will be a slight difference some things like the (Food timers, Npcs that fit the category of the skill gives out skillcapes, Npcs that cannot walk through solid objects will be released in V2, just a little update my V1 should be out by next friday or so. I am currently working as hard as i can on my source.

I have decided to make my server almost identical to RuneScape, it’s not going to be impossible training but, it also will not be like DeltaScape meaning it won’t have the same quest features, but i just decided to turn the project around. When I say almost i mean…no shops spread around the whole map, it’s going to be a normal Free To Play server, and when you get members your entitled to the members items, this could stretch the length but i will finish, and thats a promise.

As I go on and I scroll down the Client.Java I notice how much work the whole project needs. I was asked to make a client, which is what i’m going to do on top of this whole project, the whole meaning of the server is to make it fun while the skills are pretty slow, it gives you a challenge, it will still be like normal Figment all the shops will be the same, just the skills re-vamped and edited. I hope you all enjoy my updates.

Read full topic
